lead_paragraph:
A forest ranger’s peaceful tenure over a forest housing a busy nature lodge, is interrupted by the arrival of a very deadly and hungry, 18-foot grizzly bear.
This ecology-themed horror movie was a major hit upon it’s original theatrical release. It
